Service Details: - Encourages, facilitates and promotes hockey- Program improves skaters' leg strength, quickness, and flexibility; their core stability, balance, skating technique, and how to apply these factors during a game- Educates on pre/post camp strategies to further gains and reinforce techniques learned in these areas- Instructor to student ratio is 1:7
